basics.name: Aakash
basics.label: AI Software Engineer and Cloud Practitioner
basics.summary: AI Software Engineer and Cloud Practitioner with over 2 years of experience architecting scalable data and AI platforms. Proven track record leading teams to deploy agentic AI solutions and Generative AI microservices. Expert in Python, AWS/GCP, and RAG workflows, with a focus on building autonomous decision-making systems for non-profits and financial sectors.

work.name: Saayam For All
highlights: Architected and led the organization's first AI chatbot on AWS EKS with Kafka, ensuring high performance and reliability.
Mentored developers on AI and LLMs, deploying agentic workflows with LangChain and Python.
Designed scalable data pipelines to support retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) features, integrating REST APIs and AWS Lambda for adaptive task execution.
Orchestrated cloud operations and infrastructure using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and CloudWatch, ensuring high availability for critical services.
Implemented automated testing & maintained robust CI/CD pipelines to ensure code quality & rapid deployment cycles.

work.name: Aradhana Financers
highlights: Enhanced CX by delivering Agile software enhancements that improved financial reporting dashboards.
Built and maintained financial software applications for loan processing and payments, ensuring strict compliance with RBI.
Optimized SQL databases and APIs to accelerate financial transactions and banking integrations.
Developed Python and SQL data analytics modules to automate dashboards, boosting decision-making efficiency by 35%.

projects.name: DomainDNA (Agentic AI Security Tool)
highlights: Engineered the 'Faith Engine,' an autonomous AI agent capable of reasoning and risk assessment for domain history analysis using GPT-4 and FastAPI.
Demoed thought leadership in AI safety by building a real-time decision support system for browser security.
Built a responsive frontend using React, focusing on user-friendly design and intuitive interface.
Created a Chrome browser extension for real-time domain safety checks.
Implemented a robust backend using FastAPI for efficient data processing and analysis.

projects.name: Secure Task Management Systems
highlights: Built a full-stack task and customer management system with secure role-based access and automated workflows.
Designed ETL pipelines for user data migration, audit logs, and workflow synchronization with optimized batch jobs.
Integrated CRMS features for customer lifecycle tracking, task automation, and performance analytics.
Engineered a scalable NestJS backend with TypeORM, JWT auth, and automated CI/CD deployment pipeline.

projects.name: Habitat for Humanity
highlights: Developed a comprehensive React dashboard application for Habitat for Humanity a US Based non-profit organization, enabling employees to efficiently manage surveys, analyze data, and gain insights.
Built an AI-driven decision support system using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to allow non-technical stakeholders to query complex survey data via natural language.

education.area: Master of Science in Information Technology

education.institution: Poojya Doddappa Appa College of Engineering
education.area: Bachelor's of Engineering in Computer Science
